__TOC__

Thanks to the help of the <nowiki>[[https://ubuntu-mate.org/ | Ubuntu MATE]]</nowiki> team and their tool <nowiki>[[https://ubuntu-pi-flavour-maker.org/ | Ubuntu Pi Flavor Maker]]</nowiki>, we are now able to provide ''community-supported'' images of Lubuntu for the <nowiki>[[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ARM_architecture | arm]]</nowiki>v7-equipped <nowiki>[[https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ | Raspberry Pi 2]]</nowiki>. Note that there is no current support for earlier Pi models, since they use the armv6 chip, though <nowiki>[[https://www.debian.org/ports/arm/ | Debian]]</nowiki> does support them.

<nowiki>[[http://lubuntu.me/lubuntu-lxqt-in-a-raspberry-pi/ | Here]]</nowiki>'s the Pi running LXQt in Xenial:

<nowiki>[[attachment:pi2-xenial-lxqt.png|<nowiki>[[File:pi2-xenial-lxqt.png||width=90%]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] 

Testing will be exploratory and non-formal. If you see a bug, please report it to the development <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Lubuntu/ContactUs#Contact_Us | mailing list]]</nowiki>.

Keep checking back here for more news!
